LanguageData.OutlanderRoughPig.label: rough pig union
LanguageData.OutlanderRoughPig.description: A loose union of hardy pigskin townships. They're willing to make friends, even with thinsnouts, but they're also ready to toss a bomb and gnaw human gristle when it suits them. Treat them with respect and they'll offer a trotter to an ally in need. Turn against them and the last thing you hear might be a triumphant battle squeal.
LanguageData.PirateWaster.label: пірати сміттярі
LanguageData.PirateWaster.description: Неорганізована група жорстоких піратських банд, що складаються переважно зі сміттярів - ксенолюдей, створених для процвітання в умовах токсинів і забруднення. Вони мало зацікавлені в будівництві або сільському господарстві, вважаючи за краще забирати їжу в інших, використовуючи насильство.\n\nЇх технологічний рівень залежить в основному від того, кого вони зуміли обікрасти недавно. Здебільшого вони носять порохову зброю, хоча деякі вважають за краще колоти жертв з близької відстані.
LanguageData.PirateYttakin.label: yttakin pirates
LanguageData.PirateYttakin.description: A close-knit band of hulking, fur-bodied pirates of the yttakin xenotype. They refuse to deal with outsiders and are quick to call their animal warriors against those who disrespect them - or whose wealth they intend to take.\n\nOriginally engineered to populate the icy planet Yttak, yttakin now pursue their traditional lifestyle on many worlds.
LanguageData.Sanguophages.label: sanguophages
LanguageData.TribeRoughNeanderthal.label: fierce neanderthal tribe
LanguageData.TribeRoughNeanderthal.description: An unfriendly, territorial tribe of neanderthals. They are open to peaceful trade, but are otherwise unfriendly and territorial. Warriors from their tribe won't hesitate to bash in the skulls of anyone they deem dangerous. Their numbers, and the extreme amounts of damage they absorb before falling make them serious foes despite their lack of technology and analytical ability.\n\nHaving been on this planet for countless generations, they have no memory of how they got here. They might be the descendants of a neanderthal service caste from a dead civilization, or even the leftovers from some ancient science experiment.
LanguageData.TribeSavageImpid.label: savage impid tribe
LanguageData.TribeSavageImpid.description: A vicious tribe of yellow-skinned, fire-spewing impids. This particular tribe has no intention of coexisting peacefully with anyone else. Their warriors are experts at using their natural speed and flame attacks to burn the towns and children of other peoples.\n\nHaving been here for thousands of years, the origins of this tribe are lost in myth. They might descend from a group of settlers who lost their technology, or an impid community in some long-ruined civilization.
